title: Help to identify a non marked IC
content:
I am Lazlo and beginner.

I would need help.
Try to identify an IC which is non marked.
This cirquit controls 8 DC motors (12v)
The mentioned two ic’s have 14 pins each.
I assume, these 2 IC’s are identical and could control The BD 135 - BD 136’s (totally 8 pairs of transistors)
I just started the tracking, and realized that the 8th pin of the IC connects to the Base pin of a BD136.

Any idea?

Thanks in advance.
Lazlo

comments.text: Unfortunately this site (in contrast to SE/EE) does not provide a schematics editor. However, please edit your question to add the schematic around these ICs. With the few information bits it is quite impossible to answer your question.
